title: netstat appears to report nothing
body: Typing netstat , netstat -an etc provides no results, where the console version works fine.

comments.body: @Darryl Bennet - You're doing that in WSL, right? ;)
Hi I am using "build preview 14986.rs_prerelease.161202-1928" and the command "netstat -an" worked for me in this build.
